record.field: # Write comment and status = approved / other tier_reviews = record.review_ids.filtered(lambda l: l.done_by == env.user) comment = ",".join(tier_reviews.mapped("comment")) committee = record.work_acceptance_committee_ids.filtered(lambda l: l.employee_id.user_id == env.user) if env.context.get("validate_as_other"): committee.write({"status": "other", "note": comment}) else: committee.write({"status": "approved", "note": comment})
